text: Giacomo Della Chiesa (born 7 February 1962) is an Italian equestrian. He competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Giacomo Della Chiesa
